text: Navour-sur-Grosne is a commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Saône- et-Loire department in east France. It was created on 1 January 2019 and consists of the former communes of Clermain (the seat), Brandon and Montagny- sur-Grosne.Arrêté préfectoral 13 November 2018 == References == Category:2019 establishments in France Category:Communes in Saône-et-Loire
title: Navour-sur-Grosne
